message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $85.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you consider selling it to me for $77?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $82.50.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you consider selling it to me for $80?
